modName: DMC Samurai sword ported from TES4
summary: Ported a Samurai sword Yamato of Devil May Cry series from TES4.
descriptionHtml:
** All the credits give to the original TES4 mod author Shokkimonkii (and his open license), and I just port some of his work to Skyrim.

[img]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/images/718-1-1321744244.jpg[/img]

== HOW TO INSTALL ==
1. just extract the archive to your data folder (for example: D:\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data)
2. active \"sword_yamato.esp\" from the \"data files\" option of Skyrim lanucher or any other mod manager.

== HOW TO OBTAIN ==
** Since Skyrim has no official modding tool available, I\'m afraid that you can only obtain these weapons from console for now.
1. type ~ to enter the console mode
2. type \"player.additem [itemcode] 1\" to obtain the corresponding weapon
** NOTE: please replace your mod index with 0X
    itemcode = 0X000800   =>  the Samurai sword Yamato
    itemcode = 0X000801   =>  the Samurai sword Yamato without scabbard
( for most of users, try 02000800 and 02000801, otherwise try any number > 02)

original TES4 mod link
http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=21546
author: Shokkimonkii and invalidfate
